description:
Excellent value in a set that includes everything you need to attach one kayak to your roof rack.

  • Custom-designed saddle conforms to multiple hull shapes
  • Integrated rubber pads with large contact surfaces provide protection and eliminate hot spots
  • Comes complete with 4 saddles, all mounting hardware, and heavy-duty straps
  • Additional safety provided by included bow and stern tie downs
  • Works with Thule® standard crossbars, round bars and most factory-installed crossbars
  • Fits kayaks up to 90cm (36in.) wide with a max of 34kg (75lbs)
name: Thule Top Deck Kayak Rack
